page.title: 16RECREATION 2
page.content: In the Urban area recreation centres round TV and Videos. The second most important interest is in soccer Liverpool and Everton - all ages will make for the match if it can be afforded. Sport generally is a favourite pastime. The Sunday Soccer Leagues cater all ages from 10+ and are very popular. There is a Ladies Netball League which use the Sports Centre. This Centre is very popular and is used regularly for tennis, 5-a-side, squash and badminton, table tennis, basketball and netball. Swimming is runner up to soccer and people use Nye Bevan Pool and the High School Pool. Golf is a growing sport with the opening of the Beacon Municipal Golf Course.
